title: Hepatosplenic T-cell lymphoma
block: Malignant neoplasms, stated or presumed to be primary, of lymphoid, haematopoietic and related tissue
category: Other specified types of T/NK-cell lymphoma
exclusion: secondary and unspecified neoplasm of lymph nodes
anaplastic large cell lymphoma, ALK negative
